com.felix.util

Class Preprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.felix.util.Preprocessor

  • public class Preprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Functionality to do a pattern matched and vocabulary based search and replacement in text. Might be used as a preprocessor for text to speech applications. The possibility to have different types of preprocessors for specific use cases can be done by creating several instances. The Preprocessors are configures by text files or string streams. The configuration file (or stream) matches the type integers to vocabulary and rule files where the replacements are specified.
    Author:
    felix

      Constructor with two file names for simple use cases not needing preprocessors of multiple kinds and ignoring the Locale.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Preprocessor getInstance(int type,
                                       java.lang.String configPath,
                                       boolean forceNew)
         Get an instance of a preprocessor for a certain type. The types are
 declared in the configuration file.
 Here's an example of a config file;
 TYPE_EMAIL=1
 TYPE_NEWS=2
 1_rules.de=res/email_rules.txt
 2_rules.de=res/news_rules.txt
 1_vocab.de=res/email_vocab.txt
 2_vocab.de=res/news_vocab.txt
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the preprocessor.
        configPath - The path to the configuration file.
        Returns:
        The preprocessor.

      • getInstance

        public static Preprocessor getInstance(int type,
                                       java.lang.String configPath,
                                       java.io.File parentFolder,
                                       boolean forceNew)
        Initialize an instance given the type, the configuration path and a parent folder containing the configuration files.
        Parameters:
        type - The type.
        configPath - The path to the configuration file.
        parentFolder - The folder containing the configuration.
        forceNew - Get new instance even if exists
        Returns:

      • setLocale

        public static void setLocale(java.util.Locale locale)
        Der Preprozessor sollte dahingehend erweitert werden, das er sprachspezifische Regeln verarbeiten kann. Beispiel: 8_mail_vocab 8_mail_vocab.de 8_mail_vocab.en Preprozessor-Klasse bietet Methode setLocale(java.util.Locale) mit der festgelegt wird, welche Datei genutzt wird. Entweder eine vorhanden Sprachspezifische oder die Default-Datei (ohne Sprachangabe)
        Parameters:
        locale - The (global) Locale of all preprocessors.

                                       java.io.InputStream configStream,

        Parameters:
        type -
        configStream -
        context - Unspecified context (e.g. Android or Axis). Used in AndroidHelper.
        Returns:
